hanzi-su-wiki:
睦

Значения

Дружить; тёплый; дружеский; дружба

Мнемоника

Радостно пялить друг на друга глаза 目, которые, округляясь, становятся похожими на шляпку гриба — два слоя почвы 土 и ножка 八 между ними.
purpleculture_pinyin:
mù
amicable; harmonious
дружелюбный; гармоничный
rtega_mnemonic:
睦睦RSfriendly, amiable, peaceful
  • landscape with many trees 坴 looking 目 peaceful
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 坴 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
和睦 [ hé mù ]: peaceful relations; harmonious
睦邻 [ mù lín ]: neighborly relations
不睦 [ bù mù ]: to not get along well; to be at odds
敦睦 [ dūn mù ]: to promote friendly relations
和睦相处 [ hé mù xiāng chǔ ]: to live in harmony; to get along with each other
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 目 [ mù ] eye; to look, to see; division, topic
    • 坴 [ lù ] a clod of earth; land
heisig_constituent: intimate, eye, mini-tractor, rice seedlings, soil, dirt, ground, human legs, soil2, dirt2, ground2
koohiiStory1: The farmer was never very intimate with his wife. He always kept his eye on his precious rice seedlings in the soil.
koohiiStory2: I keep an intimate relationship with my rice seedlings -- I never take my eye from the soil.
kunYomi: むつ.まじい、むつ.む、むつ.ぶ
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you see someone eyeing your womb you're probably going to be weirded out by how friendly they're acting. You only let people who are really, really close to you look at your womb. So if this guy is acting that friendly he should have introduced himself first.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine having someone you aren't friendly with trying to have a look at your womb. No thank you.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This friendly guy comes up to you and start to introduce himself, "ぼく-" but you stop him. He's been getting way too friendly with your womb and you don't want to hear who he is. He can ぼく at someone else, you're out.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine only letting this guy start to introduce himself with ぼく before walking the heck outta there. Just because he was acting friendly doesn't mean he was actually your friend.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the eye (目) on the ground ahead (坴) is intimate with you
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " head " to the sound of "坴", it means goodwill and harmony. "Shu‧ Yaodian": "The nine races are harmonious, and the people are flat."

" Harmony " can mean obedience and obedience. "Said Wen": "Mu Shun Ye. From the head, the sound. One said: Respect and He Ye." ?"

" Mu " also means harmony. Jin Zuosi "Wei Du Fu": "To entertain the monarch of the four barbarians, and to reconcile the customs of the eight wilderness.
humanum_short_description_en: From the " head ", the sound of "坴" means goodwill and harmony.
humanum_full_description:
從「目」，「坴」聲，表示親善、和睦。《書‧堯典》：「九族既睦，平章百姓。」

　　「睦」可表示服從、順從。《說文》：「目順也。从目，坴聲。一曰：敬和也。」 《左傳‧僖公二十二年》：「吾兄弟之不協，焉能怨諸侯之不睦？」

　　「睦」也表示調和。晉左思〈魏都賦〉：「以娛四夷之君，以睦八荒之俗。」
humanum_short_description: 從「目」，「坴」聲，表示親善、和睦。

從「 目 」，「 坴 」聲，表示親善、和睦。《書‧堯典》：「九族既睦，平章百姓。」 「 睦 」可表示服從、順從。《說文》：「目順也。从目，坴聲。一曰：敬和也。」 《左傳‧僖公二十二年》：「吾兄弟之不協，焉能怨諸侯之不睦？」 「 睦 」也表示調和。晉左思〈魏都賦〉：「以娛四夷之君，以睦八荒之俗。」
From the " head" to the sound of " 坴", it means goodwill and harmony. "Shu‧ Yaodian": "The nine races are harmonious, and the people are flat." " Harmony" can mean obedience and obedience. "Said Wen": "Mu Shun Ye. From the head, the sound. One said: Respect and He Ye." ?" " Mu" also means harmony. Jin Zuosi "Wei Du Fu": "To entertain the monarch of the four barbarians, and to reconcile the customs of the eight wilderness.

睦字的基本解释

睦
mù
和好，亲近：和睦。睦邻。兄弟不睦。
姓。

睦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mù］
［《廣韻》莫六切，入屋，明。］
(1)亲善；和睦。
(2)亲密；亲近。参见“睦親”。
(3)服从；顺从。
(4)调和。
(5)通“穆”。参见“睦睦”。
(6)古州名。隋置。辖境相当于今浙江省桐庐、建德、淳安三县地。
(7)古州名。隋置，旋废。唐武德四年复置。故地在今湖北长阳东。参阅清顾祖禹《读史方舆纪要·湖广四·荆州府》。
(8)姓。唐有睦伽陀。见《资治通鉴·唐高祖武德八年》及胡三省注。

睦字的英文翻译

◎ 睦
harmonious, peaceful

睦字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　睦； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页811第03
〔古文〕?【集韻】【韻會】?莫六切，音牧。【說文】目順也。一曰敬和也。【博雅】信也。【廣韻】親也。【書·堯典】九族旣睦。【禮·禮運】講信修睦。　又州名。唐置睦州。　又姓。【正字通】北齊散騎常侍睦豫。　又與穆通。【史記·司馬相如傳】旼旼睦睦。【前漢書】作穆穆。　又叶莫筆切，音密。【易林】種一得十，曰益有息。仁政獲民，四國親睦。　【六書故】睦，目諧也。凡人喜慍，必形于面目，故和爲睦，乖爲睽。別作?。

睦字的源字形

睦字的起名意思

：指和好，亲近。又通“穆”，表示恭敬。

Harmony
Basic explanation of words
Harmony
mù
Reconciliation, closeness: harmony. Good-neighborly. Brothers are at odds.
name.
Harmony
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mù］
["Guang Yun" Mo six cuts, enter the house, Ming. ]
(1) Goodwill; harmony.
(2) Closeness; closeness. See "friendship".
(3) Obey; obey.
(4) Reconciliation.
(5) Through "Mu". See "mumu".
(6) The name of the ancient state. Sui Zhi. The jurisdiction is equivalent to the three counties of Tonglu, Jiande and Chun'an in Zhejiang Province today.
(7) The name of the ancient state. Sui Zhi, spin waste. Tang Wude was rehoused in four years. The old place is in the east of Changyang, Hubei today. Refer to Qing Gu Zuyu's "Minutes of Reading History and Fangyu·Huguang Four·Jingzhou Mansion".
(8) Last name. Tang You Mu Jia Tuo. See "Zizhitongjian·Tang Gaozu Wude Eight Years" and Hu Sansheng's Note.

Source glyph
Harmony
Name meaning
: Refers to reconciliation and closeness. Also called "Mu" to show respect.
形声字。目表意,其形像人的眼睛,表示目光友善;幸(In)表声,奉指大土块,又通陸,有宽大平顺意,表示睦是目
光平和。本义是目光平和友善。引申为和好、亲近。

---
Пиктофонетические символы.
Значение глаза, который напоминает глаза человека, означает, что глаза дружелюбны; К счастью (In) означает, что звук представляет собой большой кусок почвы, и он открыт для земли, и имеет значение щедрый и гладкий, а это значит, что гармония умиротворяет глаз.
Первоначальное значение - мир и доброта.
Расширение - примирение и близость.
Помирись, подойди поближе: ~ сосед "и ~.
~ Сосед ~ Дон ~ И ~ Сосед ~ Дорогой ~ Разговор о вере и ремонте ~

mù
I прил./наречие
1) дружественный, мирный, дружеский; благосклонный; мирный; дружить, жить в мире
兄弟不睦 эти братья не живут в мире
2) ласковый, привязчивый; быть привязанным, любить
睦亲 любить родителей, быть привязанным к своей родне
II собств.
My (фамилия)
Radicals: 目, 坴  (eye, womb)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you see someone eyeing your womb you're probably going to be weirded out by how friendly they're acting. You only let people who are really, really close to you look at your womb. So if this guy is acting that friendly he should have introduced himself first.
Imagine having someone you aren't friendly with trying to have a look at your womb. No thank you.
Reading Mnemonic
This friendly guy comes up to you and start to introduce himself, "ぼく-" but you stop him. He's been getting way too friendly with your womb and you don't want to hear who he is. He can ぼく at someone else, you're out.
Imagine only letting this guy start to introduce himself with ぼく before walking the heck outta there. Just because he was acting friendly doesn't mean he was actually your friend.
